title: EUI-64 Converter
description: Convert between MAC addresses and IPv6 EUI-64 interface identifiers with automatic IPv6 address generation

addresses.label: MAC Addresses or EUI-64 Identifiers
addresses.tooltip: Enter MAC addresses (48-bit) or EUI-64 identifiers (64-bit)
addresses.help: Enter MAC addresses (48-bit) or EUI-64 identifiers (64-bit) one per line. Various formats supported: xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx or xx-xx-xx-xx-xx-xx

globalPrefix.label: IPv6 Global Prefix (Optional)
globalPrefix.tooltip: IPv6 network prefix for generating global addresses (e.g., 2001:db8::/64)
globalPrefix.help: IPv6 prefix for generating global unicast addresses. Leave empty to use example prefix.

info.title: EUI-64 Information
info.description: EUI-64 (Extended Unique Identifier 64-bit) is used to generate IPv6 interface identifiers from MAC addresses:

steps.split: Split MAC address: OUI (24 bits) + Device ID (24 bits)
steps.insert: Insert FFFE between OUI and Device ID
steps.flip: Flip the Universal/Local bit (bit 1) in the first octet
